document.full_text: citigroup inc said computer hackers breached the bank's network and accessed the data of about 200,000 bank card holders in north america, the latest of a string of cyber attacks on high-profile companies.
document.title: citi says hackers access bank card data
lines_and_colors: citigroup inc said computer hackers breached the bank's network and accessed the data of about 200,000 bank card holders in north america, the latest of a string of cyber attacks on high-profile companies.
